This class represents the Character class.

This refers to the list of characters currently found in the floor level.

Yhis is a boolean that determines if a floor has been conquered by the user or not.

currentFloor - Variable in class thewizardstower.Character
This refers to the current floor, or the current level, that the character is in.
currentItem - Variable in class thewizardstower.Character
This refers to the item that the character is currently using.

This refers to the current surrounding that the character is in.
